column4: Hi, my hard drive says that there's 25 gigabytes in it while there is only 13. No hidden files ext 3.  Can I get some help?
how are you getting that info ?
I am going into properties for the 25 Gigabytes.  Also I have a 13 gigabyte folder and a 180 megabyte folder.
what happens if you type df -h at the console?
